get.description: Returns real-time market data from supported protocols. See [Protocol Support Roadmap](/markets#protocol-support-roadmap) for the full list of supported providers.

get.summary: List all markets grouped by type
get.description: Returns markets grouped by type from supported protocols. See [Protocol Support Roadmap](/markets#protocol-support-roadmap) for the full list of supported providers.

get.summary: List all market positions by wallet address
get.description: Returns position data for supported protocols. See [Protocol Support Roadmap](/markets#protocol-support-roadmap) for current position tracking support.

schema.description: Comma separated list of owner addresses. Currently only supports one address.

apiKey.name: x-dialect-api-key
apiKey.description: API key for the Markets API
